analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/8/0x0d5516103752b3954d95621f470a8261151da2e4.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/8/0x0d5516103752b3954d95621f470a8261151da2e4.sol)
	- token.transferOwnership(beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0d5516103752b3954d95621f470a8261151da2e4.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleFinished (/unique_chucks/8/0x0d5516103752b3954d95621f470a8261151da2e4.sol)

Crowdsale.externalPurchase (/unique_chucks/8/0x0d5516103752b3954d95621f470a8261151da2e4.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0d5516103752b3954d95621f470a8261151da2e4.sol)

Crowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/8/0x0d5516103752b3954d95621f470a8261151da2e4.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/8/0x0d5516103752b3954d95621f470a8261151da2e4.sol)
